name: Deep Dish Lasagna
author: BSD
summary: Classic lasagna recipe that tastes delicious!
ingredients: ⅔ cup chopped fresh parsley, divided
1 (10 ounce) package chopped spinach, thawed and squeeze dried
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add lasagna noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In skillet over medium heat, brown the sausage with the onions, garlic and 1/2 the parsley; drain excess fat
Add tomato paste, tomato sauce, water, Italian seasoning, oregano, and basil; mix well
Simmer, covered, for 5 minutes; stirring occasionally
In a bowl, combine remaining parsley and ricotta, spinach, Parmesan, eggs, garlic salt, and pepper; mix well
Spread 2 cups sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish
Begin layering with 4 noodles, 1/2 cheese mix, 1/3 remaining sauce, and 1 cup mozzarella
Repeat this layer again; the last layer will be noodles, sauce and mozzarella cheese
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes
Remove the foil; bake, uncovered, an additional 10 minutes, or until cheese is bubbly and starting to brown
